title: Relates to period of imprisonment for leaving the scene of an incident
summary: Provides that for a sentence imposed for leaving the scene of an incident without reporting where the accident caused death or serious physical injury, as required in section 600 of the vehicle and traffic law, the minimum period of imprisonment must be for two years.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the penal law, in relation to the sentence for leaving scene of a vehicular incident with knowledge that serious physical injury or death is likely to result therefrom
